name: Runestone:Pathfinders
description:
"Runestone: Pathfinder" is a 3D adventure platformer game set in the world of Runestone. Players will play as a rookie pathfinder and help the rookie get through his first trial.




Movements, jumps, and dashes are consistent. You can combo them into more complex moves.




You can expect a packed level with collectibles and achievements that take multiple playthroughs to accomplish.
A fruitful adventure awaits you!




You might finish the first playthrough in one hour or two. You will improve the timer drastically the second time.





You can unlock and choose
-7(or more?) styles of feather color
-4 styles of backpacks





Compete against players around the world to see who is the better Pathfinder!
